txt.en: 'Are you ready, [placeholder]? I hope big and little folks have laid out all the doormats that I gave them, because I plan to put on my best costume and visit every one of them!\n\n'Will you do the same? Why don't you go put on a costume, gather some treats, and then come back and tell me all about it?'

You should wear a costume and collect treats from housing neighbourhood doormats.\n\nTo help participation in this event, be sure to place the doormat you received from Begonia Grubb on your own house! More doormats can be obtained from Mogo Bracegirdle.
'You did it, [placeholder]? Oh, how grand that my plan has come off! Tell me all about it. Which treats did you get? Did you try any of them? I must hear everything - everything!'
Begonia Grubb has been giving out doormats and treats, in hopes of starting a Treats or Trickery tradition in housing neighbourhoods.

Begonia Grubb can be found in Wistmead, by the Party tree, and in the town centre of all housing neighbourhoods.\n\nReturn to Begonia Grubb and tell her about the treats you collected while in costume.
